name: CheckIn
text message: Hi! We would love to check in with how you are doing! Have you managed to keep calm whenever you get angry over the past few days?
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Anger management

name: CheckIn
text message: Great job! You should be proud of yourself! Research shows that every time you control your anger in front of your child, you increase your child's brain development.

name: CheckIn
text message: Sorry to hear that you are finding this challenging. If you are getting angry because your baby won’t stop crying, it’s OK to leave them on their back in a safe location, like a crib, and walk away for a bit. Check on your baby every 5-10 minutes.
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Anger management

name: CheckIn
text message: It is completely normal to experience this challenge. Next time you feel yourself getting angry try to manage this by taking deep breaths in. This can allow you to relax and reduce stress, which can help with managing your emotions. Every time you do this, you increase your child's brain development!
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Anger management

name: CheckIn

name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Anger management

name: CheckIn
text message: That is okay! Remember you can access parenting content at anytime by typing "Help". Chat to you later!
name of flow: PLH - Content - Relax - CheckIn - Anger management
